Introduction

Hong Jihye, known under her stage name Chodan, is a South Korean singer, drummer, YouTuber, and Twitch streamer under 3Y CORPORATION and Tamago Production. She is best known as the leader and the drummer of the project girl band QWER. She represents the letter Q.

On July 2, 2023, Chodan was confirmed as a member of the upcoming female band QWER. She made her debut with the band on October 18, 2023, with the release of their debut single album, "Harmony from Discord".
